content.text: Welcome to the manual for Stone Age! If you find any bugs within this manual or mod, please report them on §phttps://github.com/yanny7/StoneAge/issues §6Github§r.

This workbench allows you to craft primitive items. You just have to arrange the required items on the workbench with right-click, and then right-click with the §pflint_knife §6flint knife§r§p to craft the item.
The drying rack is used for drying items like grass. Just right-click the drying rack with an item and wait. Note that the item is only dried during the day.

The tanning rack is used for tanning §praw_hide §6raw hide§r§p into leather. You can place raw hide on the tanning rack with right-click and then right-click on the hide several times with a §pflint_knife §6flint knife§r§p.
The stone chest allows you to store a small amount of items. It is still better than nothing!

The tree stump is a way to get planks of half-slabs. You can just place a valid item on the tree stump with right-click and then left-click with the required tool; an axe for wood, or a hammer for stone.

The aqueduct allows you to transfer water to hydrate your crops. To fill the aqueduct with water, place one near a water source block. You can activate the aqueduct with a right-click, which will result in bubbles from it. Aqueduct can transfer water horizontally and downward. Activated aqueducts also speed up crop growth.
Due to wool being unavailable to you, you can still sleep on a bed made from dried grass.

The animal trough feeds animals nearby. You can right click the trough to open the menu and place feed inside for your animals, such as wheat or seeds. An animal trough with food inside will speed-up the growth rate of baby animals and cause adult animals to breed.

The millstone is used for milling wheat into flour, and sugar cane into sugar. Right-click while sneaking to open the menu, and place wheat or sugar cane inside. Then you can right-click the millstone with an open hand to mill these items.
The campfire is used for cooking food.
The vanilla crafting table is the final step to finish the stone age.
A hay bale can be placed under a campfire for more smoke.
The fishing net allows you to passively catch fish by placing a §pgrass_mesh §6grass mesh§r§p or §pcobweb_mesh §6cobweb mesh§r§p into it. The fishing net must be placed in water to function.
Make your house more stone-age looking
Bone meal can be made from crushed bones.

Raw hide is dropped by §pdeer §6deer§r§p, §pauroch §6aurochs§r§p, §pmammoth §6mammoths§r§p, §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhinos§r§p, and cows. Raw hide can be tanned into leather using the §ptanning_rack §6tanning rack§r§p.
Antlers are dropped by §pdeer §6deer§r§p. It is used for making tools.
An unlit torch can be lit by right-click on a fire, campfire, or another torch.
Bone arrow heads are used for crafting §parrow §6arrows§r§p.
Dried grass is used as a crafting item and for making §pfire §6fire§r§p.
Leather strips are used for crafting.
Fish bones are dropped by fish and are used for crafting.
Flour is used for making bread dough.
Bread dough is used for crafting §pbread §6bread§r§p.
Saber-tooth tiger teeth are dropped by §psaber_tooth_tiger §6saber-tooth tigers§r§p.
Woolly rhino tusks are dropped by §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhinos§r§p.
Backpacks can be used to increase your carrying capacity. Right-click the backpack to open it's inventory.
Leads are used to leash animals and lead them around.
Leather is made on a §ptanning_rack §6tanning rack§r§p. Right click the rack with a §praw_hide §6raw hide§r§p and then right-click multiple times with a §pflint_knife §6flint knife§r§p.
The grass mesh is used in a §pfishing_net §6fishing net§r§p. It has 15 uses before it breaks.
The cobweb mesh is used in a §pfishing_net §6fishing net§r§p. It has 30 uses before it breaks.
The bone axe head is used for crafting §pbone_axe §6bone axe§r§p
The bone pickaxe head is used for crafting §pbone_pickaxe §6bone pickaxe§r§p
The bone hoe head is used for crafting §pbone_hoe §6bone hoe§r§p
The bone shovel head is used for crafting §pbone_shovel §6bone shovel§r§p
The bone sword head is used for crafting §pbone_sword §6bone sword§r§p
The stone axe head is used for crafting §pstone_axe §6stone axe§r§p
The stone pickaxe head is used for crafting §pstone_pickaxe §6stone pickaxe§r§p
The stone hoe head is used for crafting §pstone_hoe §6stone hoe§r§p
The stone shovel head is used for crafting §pstone_shovel §6stone shovel§r§p
The stone sword head is used for crafting §pstone_sword §6stone sword§r§p
Bone shears are used for gathering grass.

The flint knife is your first weapon. It's not very efficient, but it will help you survive and hunt animals. It is also used for crafting items on the §pflint_workbench §6flint workbench§r§p and for §ptanning_rack §6tanning§r§p.
The flint spear is a ranged weapon which is similar to the trident, but less efficient. It is still very useful for surviving and hunting in the wild.

Fat is dropped by §pauroch §6aurochs§r§p, §pboar §6boars§r§p, §pdeer §6deer§r§p, §pmammoth §6mammoths§r§p, §pmouflon §6mouflons§r§p, §psaber_tooth_tiger §6saber-tooth tigers§r§p, §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhinos§r§p, cows, pigs, and sheep.
Rhino meat is dropped by §pwoolly_rhino §6woolly rhinos§r§p.
Tiger meat is dropped by §psaber_tooth_tiger §6saber-tooth tigers§r§p.
An ancestor of cows, aurochs must be bred for several generations before they are domesticated as cows. Aurochs are passive until attacked, after which all aurochs nearby will attack you.
An ancestor of pigs, boars must be bred for several generations before they are domesticated as pigs. Boars are passive until attacked, after which all boars nearby will attack you.
Deer are skittish, and will flee if you get too close. They are the only source of antlers, which are used for crafting your first tools.
An ancestor of chickens, fowl must be bred for several generations before they are domesticated as chickens. Fowl are passive until attacked, after which all fowl nearby will attack you.
Mammoths are large, strong beasts. They are passive until attacked, after which all mammoths nearby will attack you.
An ancestor of sheep, mouflons must be bred for several generations before they are domesticated as sheep. Mouflons are passive until attacked, after which all mouflons nearby will attack you.
Saber-tooth tigers are large, dangerous beasts. They hunt down smaller prey such as deer, fowl, and §lyou§r.
Woolly rhinos are passive until attack, after which all woolly rhinos nearby will attack you.
Drop §pdried_grass §6dried grass§r§p on the ground, and right-click on it with a stick in each hand to start a fire.
